Do you ever feel like you aren't using AI to its full potential? ChatGPT PromptCounter is the simplest way to make sure you're using AI to learn more, be more productive, and elevate your life 🚀

This extension runs automatically in the background to count every prompt that you make to ChatGPT each day. Don't waste time trying to solve problems that can be solved in a simple prompt. 

We stick a smart button to the bottom right corner of your screen that links to ChatGPT from any page with the context of that page so that the full power of the world's strongest AI is integrated into your browsing experience

Key Features:

💡 AI-Powered Problem Solving:

Are you stuck on a complex problem, seeking innovative solutions, or simply looking for answers? ChatGPT is your AI partner in problem-solving. Use it to brainstorm ideas, receive expert advice, and explore creative solutions.

📚 Continuous Learning :

Knowledge is power, and ChatGPT is your gateway to endless information. Use ChatGPT to expand your horizons, learn about new topics, and deepen your understanding. Whether it's science, history, technology, or any subject, ChatGPT has you covered.

📈Prompt Tracking and Analytics :

Ever wondered how many prompts you've used in a day? ChatGPT PromptCounter keeps track of your interactions, providing you with insightful analytics. Monitor your daily usage and stay informed about your AI engagement.

🚀 Boost Productivity:

ChatGPT is not just an AI – it's a productivity booster. Use it to draft emails, explore an unfamiliar concept,  generate content, write code, and automate repetitive tasks. ChatGPT is your virtual assistant, helping you save time and achieve more.

💭 Inspiration and Ideas:

Creativity knows no bounds with ChatGPT. Whether you're a writer, artist, or entrepreneur, ChatGPT can spark your creativity, generate ideas, and provide valuable insights to fuel your projects.

🎨 Enhanced User Experience:

ChatGPT PromptCounter is designed for your convenience. Its elegant interface and easy navigation make it a pleasure to use. Say goodbye to cumbersome processes and hello to efficiency.

⚡️ Why ChatGPT PromptCounter? ⚡️

Harness the power of AI, supercharge your problem-solving skills, and make learning a daily habit. With ChatGPT PromptCounter, you have everything you need to stay productive, informed, and creative in one smart extension.

Download ChatGPT PromptCounter today and experience AI like never before. It's more than a counter; it's your AI companion. 🤖📊

Note: ChatGPT PromptCounter is not affiliated with OpenAI and is an independent extension created for the convenience of ChatGPT users. 🚀🤝
